summary:
For more than 15 years I have been working at High tech industry. In this time period I have opportunity to try out myself as a field engineer and also working in a highly standardized manufacturing environment. 

I have a broad technical knowledge and communication skill, that makes me effective in my work. I enjoy to solving complex problems, making decisions based on facts and data and dealing with people as well.

awards.title: Certificate of Global Recognition at Jabil
awards.description:
''The Respect. Recognize. Reward. Program was created to acknowledge and celebrate the individual contributions of employees worldwide.''
''You are part of a special group.  Out of Jabil’s more than 180,000 employees worldwide, just 208 employees are being recognized''

profile_positions.title: Development Engineer - VS Integrator at EUV LowNA Vacuum Architect and Optics Life Time group

profile_positions.description:
CE CS EUV Body Cluster
- Flow and Temperature control
- Mechanical layout
- Handling and Transport
+H2 Expert
profile_positions.title: Competence Engineer - EUV (NXE)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for an ASML EUV lithography tool Pre-Vacuum system worldwide technical support in a highest escalation level. Reviewing and improving service and maintenance processes. Leading root cause analyzing investigations. Close cooperation with a local and the global team. Visiting customers around the Globe (US, Europe, Taiwan, South-Korea).

● Provide worldwide 3rd line technical support of EUV products.
● Train Tech Support/Engineers and On-Site Engineers.
● Monitor and track the progress of agreed schedules and action items.
● Provide feedback to product quality teams based on Pareto analyses and make proposals for improvement projects.
● Participate in Continuous Improvement Programs for products and processes
● Diagnose and resolve problems in complex customer and internal situations
● Develop and deliver technical presentations and detailed technical training both internally and externally.
● Work simultaneously on several projects or customer issues.
● Produce frequent reporting on system status and documentation on novel systems, solutions and projects according to standards, producing documentation and test reports as necessary and publishing them on internal systems.
● Carry out testing in house and on site for novel solutions, resolving problems as they arise.
● Undertake complex analysis of test data.
● Work as a member of a multi-disciplined team, often as a lead Engineer in escalation situations. 
● Develop new ideas and solutions to improve practices and procedures within the team 
● Mentor and train engineers to reach agreed objectives and guides their personal development, providing motivation
profile_positions.title: Global Technical Support Engineer EUV - 3rd Line

profile_positions.description:
(Division world wide was sold to iQor)
Working within a team to increase test/repair capability of the company in global level. 
Using a wide range of  equipments (IP, GSM, Core, switching and power units). Leading a small group of engineer in The Netherlands, coordinate the short and long term operation according the market and the customer requirements.

●  Leading local research and development team
●  After relocation set-up the new technical facility
●  Technical lead of the launching project team in the re-location project
●  New product implementation projects lead
●  Continued cooperation with a global R&D departments (UK, USA and India)
●  Knowledge sharing and transferring between company locations
●  Set-up short and long term research strategies
●  Creating and authorise work instructions, to transfer processes from R&D to operations
●  Performance analysis and goals setting for engineers (KPI’s)
●  Coordination the cooperation with local and abroad technical suppliers
●  Be a technical contact and provide informations to the customers 
(avoid escalations or give them technical / non-technical process views)
●  Providing technical information, time and price estimates to sales team
●  Provide technical informations and estimates to business unit department
●  Provide technical documentations, leadtime and SLA's to customer service department
●  Coordinating daily operations activities (IT, HR, logistic, procurement, etc.)
●  Local expert of business operations, customer relations and logistic IT system (SL)
●  Prepare and be Technical lead in the trial-projects 
●  System and software - reverse engineering
● General problem solving
●  Acting as a local IT support
profile_positions.title: Lead engineer at Telecom Research & Development Department NL

profile_positions.description:
Managing 10-15 test and the repair engineers in technical operations department.

● Create and maintenance the planning for the continuous and efficient operation
● Represent the department in variable weekly meetings (HR, Planning, Management
● Continuously increase the capability and the progress in the department
● Continuously cost and process optimization
● Product and material flow control in the department
● Coordinating internal R&D projects
●  Coordination the cooperation with local and abroad technical suppliers
● Be a technical contact and provide informations to the customers 
(avoid escalations or give them technical / non-technical informations)
● Performance analysis and goals setting for engineers (KPI’s)
● Provide technical feedback, leadtime and SLA's to customer service department
● Overtimes, holidays and illness managing at the department
● Continuously looking for a new potential engineers, evaluate and interviewing them
● Prepare and be Technical lead in the trial-projects 
● Lead new product implementation projects
profile_positions.title: Supervisor of Technical Operation Department (Telecom)

profile_positions.description:
Testing variable telecommunication equipments (IP, GSM switching and power units). Following or creating work instructions. 

● Commission different kinds of Radio Base Stations and Microwave equipment's
● Test the complete station or just a part
● Make test report and create a fault description if is necessary
● Do measurement on component level to make more accurate fault description
● Use the service and the test manuals or create a new ones
● Use Oracle company management system to create test reports and transfer or search the items 
● Knowledge about  5S and Lean Six Sigma concepts and tools 
● Continuous improvement projects
● New products implementation (NPI), create a basic user manual and the test procedure for the other engineers
● Replace the technical department supervisor (temporary for 6 months)
  (Planning meeting with customer services two times a week, organize the technical department IN-   and OUT capabilities)
profile_positions.title: Test engineer (Telecom)

company.name: WL Winet B.V. - Specialist in telecommunicatie netwerken

profile_positions.description:
Worked in the Netherlands and Belgium country wide indoor and outdoor as well. 

● Build a new 2G, 3G and 4G sites use the design from the main contractor
● Leading the team and the subcontractors during project realization at the field 
● Install microwave links
● Troubleshooting (antennas, cables, cabinets)
● Keep the providers specification 
(Vodafone NL, T-Mobile NL, KPN, Base BE, Proximus BE) 
● Keep and enforce the safety rules
● Update the site daily logs during the work
profile_positions.title: Field engineer, Team leader

profile_positions.description:
Start and manage own business.

● Indoor and outdoor Ethernet networks design and build
● Web service provider (websites, emails and clouds)
● Manage the administration in the company
   (recording data, invoicing and keeping the according law)
● Material procurement and management
● Customer service
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
Worked in Hungary country wide indoor and outdoor.

● Build  wireless data transfer and communication systems 
   (base on UHF, VHF technology)
● Programming and configure professional pocket radios and transmitter stations
● Project management 
   (E-on mid-level bone network switching system. Keep contact with customer and subcontractor,   create a schedule and prepare data to invoicing.)
● Install and build radar systems (for the Government, Rohde&Schwarz and TAIYO system)
profile_positions.title: Field engineer
